snippet: The World Bank on Tuesday trimmed its global growth forecast, saying a confluence of events, from the Ukraine crisis to unusually cold weather in the United States, dampened economic expansion in the first half of the year....

headline.print_headline: World Bank Cuts Growth Outlook as Ukraine Crisis Weighs
headline.main: World Bank Cuts Growth Outlook as Ukraine Crisis Weighs

lead_paragraph: The World Bank on Tuesday trimmed its global growth forecast, saying a confluence of events, from the Ukraine crisis to unusually cold weather in the United States, dampened economic expansion in the first half of the year.
